itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway pick their winners for the week in College Football and the NFL. Drinkin' Bros listeners have now won $263,000 in the last four weeks. We can't keep this streak up, but we'll try. Today's special guest is former Philadelphia Eagle John Welbourn breaks down CTE's and what it was REALLY like playing with Freddie Mitchell. 

Buy Ross' New Audiobook https://www.amazon.com/When-Darkness-Falls-Doesnt-Catch/dp/B07H5P5BY7/ref=tmm_aud_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=1530647620&sr=1-2
